name: test_update_contact_info
description: The test checks that the update contact info button is visible.
descriptionHtml:
Testing UI Element Visibility

Test verifies the visibility and accessibility of key UI elements, including:

  • Navigation to main page
  • Checking registration button presence
  • Checking transfer funds button presence
  • Checking update contact info button presence

Expected Results:

  • Registration button should be visible
  • Transfer funds button should be visible
  • Update contact info button should be visible
statusMessage:

assert False

    @pytest.fixture
    def login(page: Page) -> tuple[MainPage, OverviewPage]:
        """
        Fixture that performs user login.
    
        Args:
            page: Playwright page fixture
    
        Returns:
            Tuple[MainPage, OverviewPage]: Tuple containing initialized MainPage and
            OverviewPage
        """
        main_page = MainPage(page)
        overview_page = OverviewPage(page)
    
        main_page.navigate()
        assert main_page.is_page_loaded, "Main page is not loaded properly"
    
        username: str | None = Data().USERNAME
        password: str | None = Data().PASSWORD
    
        main_page.login(username, password)
